response.original_title: The Story of Hubble: Man's Insatiable Quest to the Stars
response.overview: Man’s Insatiable Quest to the stars ignited by Galileo in 1609 leads to the invention of the Hubble telescope that has captured the greatest cinematic drama in human history, the birth and formation of the universe transpiring over nearly 14-billion years, emanating from a source of energy so powerful that it can only be described as supernatural in nature. Based on the Book “Hubble Reveals Creation.”
response.title: The Story of Hubble: Man's Insatiable Quest to the Stars

results.name: 𝚃𝚑𝚎 𝚂𝚝𝚘𝚛𝚢 𝚘𝚏 𝙷𝚞𝚋𝚋𝚕𝚎 (𝚃𝚛𝚊𝚒𝚕𝚎𝚛) - 𝚍𝚒𝚛𝚎𝚌𝚝𝚎𝚍  𝚋𝚢  𝙹𝚘𝚜𝚎𝚙𝚑 𝙿𝚊𝚞𝚕 𝙷𝚞𝚝𝚌𝚑𝚒𝚗𝚜 (𝚄𝚗𝚒𝚝𝚎𝚍 𝚂𝚝𝚊𝚝𝚎𝚜)
